summary: Behind every great mouse there is a man - Armed with an ever growing imagination and eternal optimism, Walt begins to develop skills as an animator early in life. He overcomes a variety of hardships to become one of the biggest icons in the world: Walt Disney.
cast: Travis Tritt|Olan Rogers|Ryan Dunlap|Mark Stuart|William Haynes|Jonathan Schneck|Tyler Hayes|Adam Black|Denny Brownlee|Jim E. Chandler|Levi Cissell|Lincoln Cissell|Daniel Dennis|Phil Earnest|Matt Giesler|Mark Gullickson|Steve Mason|Kevin Max|Mary Meyer|David Richt|Isaiah Stratton|Tom Vann|Terry Weaver|Greg Wilson|Maggie Wood
title: As Dreamers Do
